duties_responsibilities.duty: Build and maintain a book of residual income through proactive business to business sales activities and strategic engagement.
Identify and prioritize sales opportunities, engaging in face-to-face interactions, networking, and relationship building to drive business growth.
Utilize a custom CRM platform to simplify client acquisition and manage business discussions aimed at solving clients' needs.
Maintain and grow client relationships to drive future revenue growth, acting as both a sales leader and an account executive.
Participate in training and development programs to enhance sales skills and expertise in the publishing industry.
Demonstrate compelling and persistent communication skills to bring concepts to life and drive sales success.
Maintain a high standard of performance and pursue continuous improvement in sales strategies and client engagement.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Sales, or a related field (Master's preferred)
